projects.title: Cloud Resume Challenge - Multi Cloud (AWS & Azure)
projects.subtitle: Infrastructure as Code | Serverless | CI/CD
projects.excerpt: Built a fully serverless resume website with visitor counter
projects.summary: Built a fully serverless resume website with visitor counter, demonstrating end-to-end cloud engineering capabilities

highlights.label: Frontend
highlights.description: Static website (HTML/CSS/JS) hosted on S3, distributed via CloudFront with custom domain and SSL/TLS certificate

highlights.label: Backend
highlights.description: Python Lambda function with DynamoDB for visitor counter, exposed via API Gateway

highlights.label: IaC
highlights.description: Complete infrastructure provisioned using Terraform with modular, reusable code

highlights.label: CI/CD
highlights.description: Automated deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions for both frontend and backend

highlights.label: Testing
highlights.description: Implemented Python unit tests and integration tests for Lambda function

projects.technologies: AWS (S3, CloudFront, Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Route 53, ACM), Terraform, Python, GitHub Actions
projects.detailedContent: Detailed documentation and architecture diagrams for this project are currently in progress.
projects.architecture: Frontend hosted on S3 with CloudFront distribution. Backend serverless Lambda with DynamoDB. API Gateway for REST endpoints.
projects.challenges: Implementing visitor counter with DynamoDB, setting up CI/CD with GitHub Actions
projects.learnings: Serverless architecture benefits, Infrastructure as Code best practices

projects.title: GenAI RAG Corrosion-AI
projects.subtitle: Generative AI | RAG | Machine Learning
projects.excerpt: AI-powered corrosion analysis platform using Retrieval-Augmented Generation
projects.summary: Developed an AI-powered corrosion analysis platform using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture for intelligent document querying and technical insights.

highlights.label: AI Architecture
highlights.description: RAG implementation with vector database for context-aware responses

highlights.label: ML Pipeline
highlights.description: LangChain integration for document processing and query handling

projects.technologies: Python, LangChain, Huggingface, Vector DB, RAG, FastAPI
projects.detailedContent: Detailed documentation and architecture diagrams for this project are currently in progress.
projects.architecture: RAG system with vector embeddings, LLM for generation, API backend
projects.challenges: Fine-tuning RAG for domain-specific accuracy, managing embeddings at scale
projects.learnings: RAG architecture, vector databases, domain-specific AI applications

projects.title: GenAI RAG Contract Document
projects.subtitle: Generative AI | Document Analysis | NLP
projects.excerpt: Intelligent contract document analysis system using RAG
projects.summary: Built an intelligent contract document analysis system using RAG to extract key information, clauses, and obligations from legal documents.

highlights.label: Document Processing
highlights.description: Automated extraction and indexing of contract terms

highlights.label: RAG Implementation
highlights.description: Context-aware question answering for contract analysis

highlights.label: NLP Features
highlights.description: Entity recognition, clause extraction, and semantic search

highlights.label: User Interface
highlights.description: Interactive query system for contract insights

projects.technologies: Python, LangChain, NLTK, Vector DB, RAG, Document AI
projects.detailedContent: Detailed documentation and architecture diagrams for this project are currently in progress.
projects.architecture: Document ingestion pipeline, RAG system with semantic search, interactive UI
projects.challenges: Handling diverse document formats, ensuring extraction accuracy
projects.learnings: Document processing, legal document understanding, RAG optimization
